body.name: HOMELAB Adjustable Shredded Memory Foam Pillow Queen Size, Cooling Bed Pillow for Sleeping with Removable Cover, Medium Pillow for Side Stomach & Back Sleepers, 1 Pack 20"x28"
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 23 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Customize Your Perfect Sleep: 💛HOMELAB Ergonomic Bed Pillows feature zippered inner and outer covers for easy foam-filling adjustment. If you prefer a firmer pillow, rest assured that our bonus pack of filler allows you to achieve the ideal level of support that suits your needs. (Each order comes with 1 adjustable pack.)

Pure and Refreshing: ❤️Rest easy on our cooling pillows filled with fresh new foam. Say goodbye to repurposed materials and embrace the peace of mind that comes with knowing you're resting on this fluffy pillow that promotes a cozier and healthier sleep experience.

Breathable Bliss: 💛Discover the pinnacle of airflow and comfort with our bambo microfiber blend cover. Designed with aerodynamic channels, it enhances breathability, whisking away heat and banishing night sweats. Stay cool, fresh, and luxuriously rested throughout the night, experiencing pure bliss.

Crafted for Quality: ❤️Featuring durable construction, silk-touch fabric, and convenient YKK zippers, they are built to last. Effortlessly adjust the inner filler to find the perfect balance of softness and support; this unique comfort will accompany you for years.

Effortless Care, Enduring Comfort: 💛Enjoy the convenience of a removable and machine-washable cover, making maintenance a breeze. Treat yourself or your loved ones to the gift of rejuvenation and restorative sleep, unlocking the potential for a brighter tomorrow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this pillow. I am a side and back sleeper, so I like that the cover has a sort of gusset on each side and not in the middle. Gives more support when I am on my side, and doesn't hurt my neck when I am on my back. The filling is good quality, and clean (if you know what I mean). No weird colors or bits of anything in the filling, just soft and gives a consistent supportive cushy feeling. I have tried other shredded foam pillows that had poor quality filling ...seemed to be just regular foam with harder pieces mixed in etc. Just didn't feel great, or look like quality filling. I haven't used this long, but so far it has helped the neck pain that the last pillow seemed to cause. I have tried so many pillows and this one is a stand out. I would recommend this. Good quality at a great price. 🙂p.s. There is a slight smell when you take this pillow out of the package. After washing the cover and throwing the pillow in the dryer, with a dryer sheet, for a few mins it was no longer noticeable. I'm sure just letting the pillow air out for a day or two would accomplish the same.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and Great Materials
reviews.reviewText: Just ordered the 2 king size pillow 2-packs. Packaging nice and compressed, pillows in vacuum bags which means they did to get stored in warehouses nor transport trucks exposed to particulates (dust, mold spores, etc) rather air tight. Came with box protection so you did not accidentally slice open pillow. Came with a nice thank you/instructions hand out about opening and letting them form. The extra stuffing is a bonus. Initial reason for purchase: I had memory foam bed pillows and needed to replace the sofa back cushions and these kings were sized perfectly. BUT I will be ordering queen for my bed after I examined in the insides! On this initial order I used one of the four pillows to over stuff the other three to the right size for my sofa back cushions. I was very impressed with the inner lawyer cover and quality of foam. There were no plastics in it! It was fluffy, clean all foam. When I saw that I took apart one of my expensive cooling gel bed pillows and found plastic chunks mixed in. I couldn’t believe it - those premium pillows were filled with literal garbage. So I will be ordering 2 of these in queen for my bed. HIGHLY recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very picky customer
reviews.reviewText: My husband is very hard to please when it comes to pillows. He has major neck issues and the wrong pillow can be debilitating. I can honestly say he has used this pillow more over the last two weeks than any other pillow. He truly enjoys it and says it the best we’ve found yet. I personally believe it is a very comfortable pillow but I have yet to find the right balance with the stuffing. This pillow is extremely fluffy but it does support your head and neck. Just sometimes a little too much. But it is adjustable, so to speak. You can add or remove stuffing. When these pillows arrive they smell very bad. But if you follow the directions in the packaging and put them in the dryer with a dryer sheet to fluff them, the smell goes away pretty quick. I will be keeping this link and buying these pillows again and again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The red spot is not a stain, it’s the reflection from a red light bulb.I ordered 4 of the king sized pillows and 2 of the body sized pillows. These pillows are everything I was looking for with the best price. The fabric is very well made. The filling is so soft and plushy. They do have a bit of smell but it’s not terrible and I’m sure it’ll resolve itself within a few days. It’s not very noticeable. I almost didn’t purchase these because there’s not many reviews, doesn’t seem like a popular brand but I’m so glad that I did! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Affordable
reviews.reviewText: I bought these pillows for my daughter, who is a stomach sleeper. She loves them! What is great is that you can add or remove the filling to best suit your comfort level. The covers are also washable, which is an added bonus. If you are a stomach sleeper, this is the pillow for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at how comfortable this pillow is. It had a slight smell to it when you first opened it. But by the second day it was pretty much gone. It comes with extra filler but I found I didn’t need to add more. Your head doesn’t sink all the way down like it does with a down pillow. Great for sleeping on your back or side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing pillow, horrible smell
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are amazing. I had my other memory foam flat pillow for side sleepers for about 3 years, but my 2 year old stole it so I found these homelab ones and I am IMPRESSED! THEY ARE SO COMFORTABLE!!Now, the reason for only 4 stars. The smell of them is horrible. It's been 3 nights and I can still smell this weird odor. Not sure if anything can be done about it. I'm praying with a few more nights it will go away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This pillow is wonderful!
reviews.reviewText: I love this pillow! When it expands, you may think it will be too soft, but it isn't. It conforms to your head and tucks into the neck area to give good support. I use it as is for side sleeping but it comes with extra filling to make it firmer if you need to. It does have a slight odor that dissipates within a day or so. I would definitely purchase again!
